item.title: #2: LinkedIn Cover
item.description:
While the blog is still in building progress, which will probably be added on the issue #4. It’ll explain on how the blog was built, and I can already say that in order to build it, the Hugo Framework will be used.

I’ve designed with the use of Canva a cover which can both be used in the LinkedIn and on the blog. It perfectly fits a user profile in LinkedIn, but does not adapt fully to company profiles as the cover width and height are smaller. Steady now has a LinkedIn!
